text:
If your business needs instant access 
to your coldest archived data,
Amazon S3 Glacier Instant Retrieval is for you.

The S3 Glacier Instant Retrieval storage 
class delivers the lowest cost
storage for data that’s rarely accessed but may be
— like news media assets or medical images.
All with the same S3 APIs & 11 9s of data durability.
For low-cost storage & data access in milliseconds,
move your archive to S3 Glacier Instant Retrieval.
